mapper.insert: insert into record_owner_visit (rid, oid, cid, bid, time, status) values (#{rid,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{oid,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{cid,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{bid,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{time,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{status,jdbcType=TINYINT})
mapper.update: update record_owner_visit set oid = #{oid,jdbcType=BIGINT}, cid = #{cid,jdbcType=BIGINT}, bid = #{bid,jdbcType=BIGINT}, time = #{time,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, status = #{status,jdbcType=TINYINT} where rid = #{rid,jdbcType=BIGINT}
mapper.select: select rid, oid, cid, bid, time, status from record_owner_visit
